skill.name: deployment-management
skill.description: Track and manage UniFi deployments across your infrastructure. Monitor deployment status, configuration, and progress for coordinated infrastructure updates.
skill.summary: Track and manage UniFi deployments across your infrastructure. Monitor deployment status, configurat...
skill.author: DataKnifeAI

security_audit.summary: This skill consists entirely of documentation (SKILL.md) with no executable code. The static analysis summary claiming 24 findings is inconsistent with the actual skill-report.json which shows zero risk factors, no critical/high/medium/low findings, and explicitly marks risk_level as 'safe'. SKILL.md is pure markdown describing UniFi deployment management capabilities - no scripts, network calls, filesystem access, environment variable reads, or external command executions exist.

content.value_statement: Managing multiple UniFi deployments across sites is complex and error-prone. This skill provides centralized visibility into all deployments with status tracking, configuration details, and progress monitoring.
actual_capabilities: List all deployments across all UniFi sites
Get detailed information for specific deployments
Monitor deployment status and progress in real-time
limitations: Requires UniFi network infrastructure to be accessible
Does not modify or execute deployment actions
Does not manage rollback or recovery operations

use_cases.title: Multi-site deployment oversight
use_cases.description: Monitor all UniFi deployments across distributed sites from a single interface

use_cases.title: Infrastructure change tracking
use_cases.description: Track and document configuration changes during planned deployment windows

use_cases.title: Deployment status reporting
use_cases.description: Generate reports on deployment progress and health for stakeholder communication

prompt_templates.title: List all deployments
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me all active UniFi deployments

prompt_templates.title: Check specific deployment
prompt_templates.prompt: Get details on the deployment named [deployment-name]

prompt_templates.title: Find failed deployments
prompt_templates.prompt: Are there any failed or stalled deployments in the current infrastructure

prompt_templates.title: Generate status report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a comprehensive deployment status report with health metrics and configuration summary

output_examples.input: Show me all active UniFi deployments
output: â€¢ HQ Campus - Firmware Update (In Progress - 67%)
â€¢ Branch Office A - Channel Change (Completed)
â€¢ Branch Office B - SSID Update (Pending)

output_examples.input: Get details on the deployment named HQ-Firmware-Upgrade
Generate a comprehensive deployment status report
output: Recommendation: Safe to proceed with planned maintenance

best_practices: Review deployment status daily during active update windows
Document configuration changes before initiating deployments
Cross-reference deployment health with network performance metrics
anti_patterns: Assuming deployment success without checking status
Making changes during active deployment without coordination
Ignoring warning indicators on deployment health checks

faq.question: Which UniFi platforms are supported?
faq.answer: This skill works with UniFi Network deployments. Check your UniFi Network version for compatibility.

faq.question: How many deployments can I monitor at once?
faq.answer: The skill can track all deployments across your connected UniFi sites without specific limits.

faq.question: How do I connect this skill to my UniFi controller?
faq.answer: Configure your UniFi credentials in the skill settings. The skill uses the UniFi API to access deployment data.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my network configuration?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides read-only access to deployment information and does not make any changes.

faq.question: Why is a deployment showing as stalled?
faq.answer: Stalled deployments may indicate connectivity issues, conflicts, or needing manual intervention. Check the details for specific error information.

faq.question: How is this different from the UniFi console?
faq.answer: This skill provides AI-powered summarization and quick access to deployment data through conversational queries.
